description: DC operating point golden data for JFET circuits (Shichman-Hodges model)

circuits.name: njf_common_source
circuits.description: N-channel JFET common-source amplifier with Vgs=0, saturation region
circuits.netlist:
NJF Common Source
.MODEL JMOD NJF (VTO=-2 BETA=1e-4 LAMBDA=0)
VDD 1 0 DC 15
RD 1 2 10k
J1 2 0 0 JMOD
.end

circuits.name: njf_self_bias
circuits.netlist:
NJF Self Bias
.MODEL JMOD NJF (VTO=-2 BETA=1e-4 LAMBDA=0)
VDD 1 0 DC 20
RD 1 2 5k
J1 2 3 3 JMOD
RS 3 0 2k
.end

analysis.notes: Self-bias: Vgs=-Ids*Rs, operating point found iteratively

circuits.name: njf_cutoff
circuits.description: N-channel JFET in cutoff region (Vgs < Vto)
circuits.netlist:
NJF Cutoff
.MODEL JMOD NJF (VTO=-2 BETA=1e-4 LAMBDA=0)
VDD 1 0 DC 10
VG 3 0 DC -3
RD 1 2 10k
J1 2 3 0 JMOD
.end

analysis.notes: Vgs=-3V < Vto=-2V, so JFET is cutoff, Ids=0, V(2)=VDD

circuits.name: njf_linear_region
circuits.netlist:
NJF Linear
.MODEL JMOD NJF (VTO=-2 BETA=1e-4 LAMBDA=0)
VDD 1 0 DC 1
VG 3 0 DC 0
RD 1 2 100
J1 2 3 0 JMOD
.end

analysis.notes: Low VDD forces JFET into linear region where Vds < Vgs-Vto

circuits.name: pjf_common_source
circuits.netlist:
PJF Common Source
.MODEL PMOD PJF (VTO=2 BETA=1e-4 LAMBDA=0)
VSS 1 0 DC -15
RD 1 2 10k
J1 2 0 0 PMOD
.end

analysis.notes: PJF mirror of NJF: Vsg=0, current flows from source to drain

circuits.name: njf_source_follower
circuits.netlist:
NJF Source Follower
.MODEL JMOD NJF (VTO=-2 BETA=1e-4 LAMBDA=0)
VDD 1 0 DC 15
VIN 2 0 DC 5
J1 1 2 3 JMOD
RS 3 0 5k
.end

analysis.notes: Source follower: Vs approximately follows Vg with offset due to Vgs

circuits.name: njf_with_lambda
circuits.netlist:
NJF With Lambda
.MODEL JMOD NJF (VTO=-2 BETA=1e-4 LAMBDA=0.01)
VDD 1 0 DC 15
RD 1 2 10k
J1 2 0 0 JMOD
.end

analysis.notes: Lambda=0.01 causes slight increase in Ids: Ids=beta*Vov^2*(1+lambda*Vds)

circuits.name: njf_current_source
circuits.description: N-channel JFET as a current source with self-bias
circuits.netlist:
NJF Current Source
.MODEL JMOD NJF (VTO=-2 BETA=1e-4 LAMBDA=0)
VDD 1 0 DC 20
RL 1 2 10k
J1 2 3 3 JMOD
RS 3 0 1k
.end

analysis.notes: Self-biased JFET current source: Vgs=-Ids*Rs, Idsâ‰ˆ0.4mA, V(2)=VDD-Ids*RL
